title: Rocket Takeoff
body: A large rocket has a mass of 2.00×10**6 kg at takeoff, and its engines produce a thrust of 3.50×10**7 N. (a) Find its initial acceleration if it takes off vertically. (b) How long does it take to reach a velocity of $$120$$ $$\frac{km}{h}$$ straight up, assuming constant mass and thrust? (c) In reality, the mass of a rocket decreases significantly as its fuel is consumed. Describe qualitatively how this affects the acceleration and time for this motion.
